abstract: Red Bulls goalkeeper Frank Rost would not be caught dead in those new colorful soccer shoes made of synthetic materials.
snippet: Red Bulls goalkeeper Frank Rost would not be caught dead in those new colorful soccer shoes made of synthetic materials.
lead_paragraph: LITTLE FALLS, N.J. -- Goalkeeper Frank Rost, 38, is the oldest player on the Red Bulls' roster (and also one of the tallest at 6 feet 5 inches).

headline.main: Red Bulls' Rost Is Old-School, and Proud of It
